archimate:Requirement.name: SC.1.2.6c: c) subject shortlisted suppliers (based on their responses to the RFI) to a relationship assessment (sometimes referred to as a due diligence review) to check that they do not pose a significant information risk to the organisation.
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
